This album is, more-or-less, a ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œBest of Europe In ConcertÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ due to the majority of the tracks being taken from the European Tour Jarre performed during 1993, around most of EuropeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s major cities.
